Communications.NoticeEvents:
The Flexible Learning Space in the Worsley building will be open Monday to Friday 8:30am until 6:00pm during the Easter vacation.

It will be closed for the Bank Holiday weekend.

Dr Win Jones will be available each Monday between 12 noon and 2:00pm, based in Waves.

Revd Jean Payne will be available each Tuesday between 12 noon and 2:00pm, based in Waves or Calvino’s.

Revd Jason McCullagh will be available each Wednesday between 11:00am and 1:00pm in the Keith Donaldson Library.
